name: Primary Particle
description:
Art & Game Design by Ben Jelter
Programming by Stefan Schmitt

A fun puzzle game for everybody! Help Dr. Hadron with his particle experiment.
Keep the particles stable for as long as possible so Dr. Hadron can study them.
Don't let the particles escape or the experiment will end.
Catch the particles... but make sure they're the right color!
As your skill increases, so does your score.
Watch out for tricky particles as your level increases.

The particle collider cost $9 Billion. Don't waste it!
